title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Design Scenarios for Enhancing Arterial Blood Gas (ABG) Analysis Competency

context.additional_context: Course designed to enhance practicing nurses' ABG interpretation skills, with flexible mobile learning support

learning_goals: By the end of the learning, 85% or more of participants can accurately explain the 5-step protocol for interpreting ABG (Arterial Blood Gas) results.
In real-time/live-recorded lecture formats, students can define 10 ABG-related terms with 90% accuracy.
Based on ABG analysis results, students can present three or more nursing interventions grounded in real-world case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
